title: Fresh level 30 looking for people to play with
body: Im a new level 30 who really wants to learn how to play well before looking at ranked, would prefer people who would be able to not get salty and can give advice. Also players who want to have fun are highly prioritized also. Support/Jungle main.{{champion:201}}

replies.body: I would be happy to duo with you sometimes :) i too am still learning since being AFK from LoL for few months

Your best bet is to play some normal games and have a lively attitude.  Find someone you can relate with and that has the same goals as you.  You'll find that you'll improve with them and you'll have alot of fun doing so.  Try discord to talk to them.
I would be more then happy to give you some advice if you would like - however I'm not that good of a player :)
Is all good man, anyone to play with or isnt as trash as me is all Im after
